Package guest

Class GuestManager

java.lang.Object
guest.GuestManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileIO.ReadWrite
public class GuestManager extends Object implements FileIO.ReadWrite
Contains control methods to manage the guest records. Implements ReadWrite interface to do file input and output.
Since:
2022-04-17
Version:
1.0
Author:
EVANGELINE NG XUAN HUI

    • getGuestList

      public ArrayList<Guest> getGuestList()
      Gets the records of guest list.
      Returns:
      guest list.

    • findById

      public Guest findById(String id)
      Searches a guest record in the guest list by identification number.
      Parameters:
      id - The identification number of the guest to search.
      Returns:
      the found guest object, or null if not found.

    • findByName

      public Guest findByName(String firstName, String lastName)
      Searches a guest record in the guest list by the guest's full name.
      Parameters:
      firstName - The guest's first name.
      lastName - The guest's last name.
      Returns:
      the found guest object, or null if not found.

    • addGuest

      public void addGuest(Guest g)
      Adds a guest record to the guest list.
      Parameters:
      g - The guest object to be added.

    • removeGuest

      public void removeGuest(String reservCode)
      Removes a guest record from the guest list.
      Parameters:
      reservCode - The corresponding reservation code of the guest to be removed.

    • searchGuest

      public void searchGuest(Scanner sc)
      Searches a guest record in the guest list. Searches can be done by either the guest's id or full name.
      Parameters:
      sc - The scanner object to scan user's input.

    • updateGuest

      public void updateGuest(Scanner sc)
      Updates a guest's details in the guest list and output to the file. Reads in the guest's id to access the guest record.
      Parameters:
      sc - The scanner object to scan user's input.

    • createGuest

      public Guest createGuest(Scanner sc)
      Creates a guest record in the guest list.
      Parameters:
      sc - The scanner object to scan user's input.
      Returns:
      the created guest record, or null if not successful.

    • displayGuestDetails

      public void displayGuestDetails(Guest g)
      Displays the details of a guest record. The information includes the guest's full name, id, country, gender, nationality, the billing details, the corresponding reservation code, and the number of the room the guest is staying
      Parameters:
      g - The guest to display details.

    • displayBillingDetails

      public void displayBillingDetails(Guest g)
      Displays the billing details of a guest. The information include the credit card holder's name, card number and the billing address.
      Parameters:
      g - The guest to display billing details.
